summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Title 15, Subtitle 1, of the Seattle Municipal Code (Ordinance 90047 as amended, the Street Use Ordinance) to transfer various functions of the Board of Public Works and the City Engineer to the Director of Engineering, and the functions of the Superintendent of Buildings to the Director of Construction and Land Use; making other changes, and repealing Sections 15.14.080, 15.12.020, 15.12.030, 15.30.010 through 15.30.050, 15.44.140 and 15.44.150 of the Seattle Municipal Code.
